form.name: form
form.description:
表单验证组件
在需要验证的表单元素上添加data-validate属性，
默认规则有
    required：是否必填
    date：日期格式验证
    number：是否是有效的号码
    url：url规则验证
    dateISO：日期ISO验证
    digits：是否是数字
    equalTo：值对比
    minlength：最少输入
    maxlength：最大输入
    email：邮箱验证
    rangelength：字符大小需在某个区间之内
    min：输入的值需要大于等于此规则定义的值
    max：输入的值需要小于等于此规则定义的值
    range：一个区间取值范围

Button.name: Button
example:
/**
	 * Created by mac on 15/11/4.
	 */
	import React, { Component ,PropTypes} from 'react';
	import ButtonGroup from '../../../lib/ButtonGroup.js';
	import Button from '../../../lib/Button.js';
	import Row from '../../../lib/Row.js';
	import Col from '../../../lib/Col.js';
	import Grid from '../../../lib/Grid.js';
	
	export default class ButtonCls extends Component{
	    render(){
	        return (
	            <Grid>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={12}>
	                        <ButtonGroup justify>
	                            <Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="warning">水平按钮组1</Button>
	                            <Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="warning">水平按钮组2</Button>
	                            <Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="warning">水平按钮组3</Button>
	                        </ButtonGroup>
	                    </Col>
	                </Row>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={12}>
	                        <ButtonGroup tacked>
	                            <Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="">垂直按钮组1</Button>
	                            <Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="">垂直按钮组2</Button>
	                            <Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="">垂直按钮组3</Button>
	                        </ButtonGroup>
	                    </Col>
	                </Row>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="warning">警告</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="success">成功</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="danger">危险</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="error">错误</Button></Col>
	                </Row>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="gray">灰色</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" >默认</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="white">白色</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="white">白色</Button></Col>
	                </Row>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" egStyle="gray">灰色</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" >默认</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" disabled>默认不可点</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" egStyle="white" disabled>白色不可点</Button></Col>
	                </Row>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" egStyle="success" disabled>成功不可点</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" >默认</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" disabled>默认不可点</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" egStyle="link" >链接</Button></Col>
	                </Row>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="xs" egStyle="success" disabled>大号</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="xs" >大号</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="xs" disabled>大号</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="xs" egStyle="link" >大号</Button></Col>
	                </Row>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="lg" egStyle="success" disabled>小号</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="lg" >小号</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="lg" disabled>小号</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="lg" egStyle="link" >小号</Button></Col>
	                </Row>
	            </Grid>
	        );
	    }
	}

ButtonGroup.name: ButtonGroup
example:
/**
	 * Created by mac on 15/11/4.
	 */
	import React, { Component ,PropTypes} from 'react';
	import ButtonGroup from '../../../lib/ButtonGroup.js';
	import Button from '../../../lib/Button.js';
	import Row from '../../../lib/Row.js';
	import Col from '../../../lib/Col.js';
	import Grid from '../../../lib/Grid.js';
	
	export default class ButtonCls extends Component{
	    render(){
	        return (
	            <Grid>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={12}>
	                        <ButtonGroup justify>
	                            <Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="warning">水平按钮组1</Button>
	                            <Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="warning">水平按钮组2</Button>
	                            <Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="warning">水平按钮组3</Button>
	                        </ButtonGroup>
	                    </Col>
	                </Row>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={12}>
	                        <ButtonGroup tacked>
	                            <Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="">垂直按钮组1</Button>
	                            <Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="">垂直按钮组2</Button>
	                            <Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="">垂直按钮组3</Button>
	                        </ButtonGroup>
	                    </Col>
	                </Row>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="warning">警告</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="success">成功</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="danger">危险</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="error">错误</Button></Col>
	                </Row>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="gray">灰色</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" >默认</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="white">白色</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button radius egSize="sm" egStyle="white">白色</Button></Col>
	                </Row>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" egStyle="gray">灰色</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" >默认</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" disabled>默认不可点</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" egStyle="white" disabled>白色不可点</Button></Col>
	                </Row>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" egStyle="success" disabled>成功不可点</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" >默认</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" disabled>默认不可点</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="sm" egStyle="link" >链接</Button></Col>
	                </Row>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="xs" egStyle="success" disabled>大号</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="xs" >大号</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="xs" disabled>大号</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="xs" egStyle="link" >大号</Button></Col>
	                </Row>
	                <Row>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="lg" egStyle="success" disabled>小号</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="lg" >小号</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="lg" disabled>小号</Button></Col>
	                    <Col sm={3}><Button block radius egSize="lg" egStyle="link" >小号</Button></Col>
	                </Row>
	            </Grid>
	        );
	    }
	}

ValidatorPanel.name: ValidatorPanel
ValidatorPanel.description:
表单验证组件
在需要验证的表单元素上添加data-validate属性，
默认规则有
    required：是否必填
    date：日期格式验证
    number：是否是有效的号码
    url：url规则验证
    dateISO：日期ISO验证
    digits：是否是数字
    equalTo：值对比
    minlength：最少输入
    maxlength：最大输入
    email：邮箱验证
    rangelength：字符大小需在某个区间之内
    min：输入的值需要大于等于此规则定义的值
    max：输入的值需要小于等于此规则定义的值
    range：一个区间取值范围

classitems.description: 表头（不加th字段，组件会进行包装）
classitems.name: header

classitems.description: 用来声明需要绑定数组对象中的哪一个属性
classitems.name: field

classitems.description: 用来渲染表格的数组，可选参数，如果传入data，会更具table下的column标签绑定的属性进行渲染
classitems.name: data

classitems.description: 是否在每一行下添加分割线
classitems.name: split

params.name: pre
params.description: 是否添加Component中定义的class前缀，默认添加

classitems.description: 验证props中的样式是否符合规则
classitems.name: getClassNames

params.name: pre
params.description: 是否添加Component中定义的class前缀，默认添加

classitems.description: 给多个className添加前缀后返回
classitems.name: getClassNamesForArguments

classitems.description: 检查元素是否存在样式名
classitems.name: hasClass

classitems.description: 给元素增加一个样式名
classitems.name: addClass

classitems.description: 给元素删除一个样式名
classitems.name: removeClass

classitems.description: A recursive merge between two objects.

params.name: base
params.description:
- the object whose properties are to be overwritten. It
                  should be either the root level or some nested level.

params.name: override
params.description:
- an object containing properties to be overwritten. It
                  should have the same structure as the object object.

classitems.description:
tacked: bool 是否垂直排列
justify: justify 是否自适应宽度
选择某个具体日期后执行的回调函数

autoVal

classitems.description: 取得符合要求的值，父级回调存在的话调用

classitems.description: 根据当前值是否为select内的值，判断是否改变state的值
classitems.name: getTrueVal

classitems.description: 验证输入值是否为select内容，return true 否则return false
classitems.name: isInSelect

classitems.description: 点击或者enter键时，选择当前li的值，并关闭ul
classitems.name: chooseItem

classitems.description: target为flase移除li的active状态，否则将obj子元素的值付给state.value
classitems.name: removeAllActive

classitems.description: keydown时触发，不通方向键分别对应不同方法
classitems.name: keyIn

classitems.description:
当ul显示时，方向键移动起作用
遍历寻找当前active元素的位置，并移除active
下方向键，判断active元素是否为最后一个，是则不再向下否则i+1
上方向键，判断active元素是否为第一个，是则不再向上否则i－1
如果active为第五个元素之前的元素，则scrollTop不变，否则每向下一个，scrollTop加30

渲染li元素，并根据autoVal来匹配获得符合元素
this.state.autoVal 为input输入值，初始为.*匹配任意
classitems.name: renderLi

classitems.description: 根据auto存在与否渲染不同类型的元素
classitems.name: render

classitems.description: 需要在初始的时候打开第几个tab，默认为0（从0计数，即打开第一个tab）
classitems.name: activeTab

classitems.description: toast类型：分为success,error,loading 三种。默认success

classitems.description: tips n秒后消失 默认2秒

接收到新props时执行,state.show变为nextProps.show
